com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class DraggableContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.DraggableContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, FixedComponent, Toggleable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HUDPanel

    public class DraggableContainer
extends CollapsibleContainer
implements FixedComponent
    Class for a FixedComponent that is also a CollapsibleContainer (i.e. a Panel), that can be dragged by the user using the mouse.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Point attachPoint
      Point storing the point, were the user started to drag the panel.
      protected boolean bodyDrag
      Whether to allow the body to be dragged.
      protected boolean dragging
      Flag indicating whether the user is dragging the component with the mouse.
      protected java.awt.Point position
      Current position of the panel.
      protected int width
      The panel width.

      • Fields inherited from class com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer

                          java.awt.Point position,
                          int width)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        title - caption of the container
        description - the description for this component
        renderer - Renderer for the container
        open - Toggleable to indicate whether the container is open or closed
        animation - the animation for opening and closing the container
        toggle - the Toggleable to be toggled by the user
        position - the initial position of the container
        width - the width of the container
